message.body: I had an awful sleep. I literally woke up every hour with the exception of 2 and 6 am. Obviously I need you with me.
Oh baby, im so sorry. We spoiled each other this break. Lets do it again! And sorry i missed your calls darling. I was heading to school. Call you after class!
Oh I figured. Tis okie. I just wanted to make sure you were awake :) But I have decided that I am also sick, and that is the reason why I couldn't sleep.
Thank you for that :) Veeery sleepy too. And so sorry that youre not feeling well. Get better, right now! Home home and please rest.
I go home now :) Call you soon!
Oh no!!! You're not at work yet, are you?
Yay! So I will brush my teeth and I'll call ya in a jiffy!
I hate school but I love you :) goodnight baby!
I hate work but I love you :) Good morning, darling lovely!
Good morning! Hope work was okay!
